mapper.insert:
select seq_car_no.nextval from dual
insert into car values( #{carNo}, #{userNo}, #{c_Model}, #{c_file}, #{c_num}, #{c_color}, #{num_PA}, #{introduce} )
mapper.select: select c.no AS carNo, c.userNo, c.carName AS c_Model, c.carNo as c_num, c.carColor AS c_color, c.people as num_PA, c.introduce, u.name as username, u.birth as userBD, u.licenseNo AS dl, u.licenseType from users u, car c where u.no = c.userno and u.no = #{userNo} order by c.no desc
mapper.update: update users set name = #{username}, birth = #{userBD}, licenseNo = #{dl}, licenseType = #{licensetype} where no = #{userNo}
update car set carname = #{c_Model}, carno = #{c_num}, carpicture = #{c_file}, carcolor = #{c_color}, people = #{num_PA}, introduce = #{introduce} where userno = #{userNo}
delete from cardetail where carno = (select no from car where userno = #{userNo})
mapper.select: select count(*) count from (select type, regdate, p.fullplace, r.point, r.status from spotmate s, (select regdate, point, mateNo, status from reservation where userNo = #{userNo}) r, (select LISTAGG(place, ',') within group (order by wayno asc) as fullPlace, mateNo from place group by mateNo) p where s.no = r.mateNo and p.mateNo = r.mateNo and s.status = 'close' group by type, regdate, r.point, r.status, p.fullplace, s.no order by s.no desc)

select count(*) count from (select type, regdate, p.fullplace, r.point, r.status from spotmate s, (select regdate, point, mateNo, status from reservation r where userNo = #{userNo} and status like '%'||#{usVo.status}||'%' ) r, (select LISTAGG(place, ',') within group (order by wayno asc) as fullPlace, mateNo from place group by mateNo) p where s.no = r.mateNo and p.mateNo = r.mateNo and s.status = 'close' and regDate >= #{usVo.sdate} and regDate <= #{usVo.edate} and type like '%'||#{usVo.type}||'%' order by s.no desc)

select rn, type, regDate, fullplace, point, status, mateNo from (select rownum rn, type, regdate, fullplace, point, status, mateNo from (select type, regdate, p.fullplace, r.point, r.status, r.mateNo from spotmate s, (select regdate, point, mateNo, status from reservation r where userNo = #{userNo} and status like '%'||#{usVo.status}||'%' and regDate >= #{usVo.sdate} and regDate <= #{usVo.edate}) r, (select LISTAGG(place, ',') within group (order by wayno asc) as fullPlace, mateNo from place group by mateNo) p where s.no = r.mateNo and p.mateNo = r.mateNo and s.status = 'close' and type like '%'||#{usVo.type}||'%' group by type, regdate, r.point, r.status, p.fullplace, s.no, r.mateNo order by s.no desc)) where rn >= #{sNum} and rn <= #{eNum}

select rn, type, regDate, fullplace, point, status, mateNo from (select rownum rn, type, regdate, fullplace, point, status, mateNo from (select type, regdate, p.fullplace, r.point, r.status, r.mateNo from spotmate s, (select regdate, point, mateNo, status from reservation where userNo = #{userNo}) r, (select LISTAGG(place, ',') within group (order by wayno asc) as fullPlace, mateNo from place group by mateNo) p where s.no = r.mateNo and p.mateNo = r.mateNo and s.status = 'close' group by type, regdate, r.point, r.status, p.fullplace, s.no, r.mateNo order by s.no desc)) where rn >= #{sNum} and rn <= #{eNum}

select rn, type, regDate, fullplace, point, status, mateNo from (select rownum rn, type, regdate, fullplace, point, status, mateNo from (select type, regdate, p.fullplace, r.point, r.status, r.mateNo from spotmate s, (select regdate, point, mateNo, status from reservation where userNo = #{userNo} and driverNo = #{userNo}) r, (select LISTAGG(place, ',') within group (order by wayno asc) as fullPlace, mateNo from place group by mateNo) p where s.no = r.mateNo and p.mateNo = r.mateNo and s.status = 'close' group by type, regdate, r.point, r.status, p.fullplace, s.no, r.mateNo order by s.no desc)) where rn >= #{sNum} and rn <= #{eNum}

select count(*) count from (select type, regdate, p.fullplace, r.point, r.status from spotmate s, (select regdate, point, mateNo, status from reservation where userNo = #{userNo} and driverNo = #{driverNo}) r, (select LISTAGG(place, ',') within group (order by wayno asc) as fullPlace, mateNo from place group by mateNo) p where s.no = r.mateNo and p.mateNo = r.mateNo and s.status = 'close' group by type, regdate, r.point, r.status, p.fullplace, s.no, r.mateNo order by s.no desc)

select count(*) count from (select type, regdate, p.fullplace, r.point, r.status from spotmate s, (select regdate, point, mateNo from reservation r where userNo = #{userNo} and driverNo = #{userNo} and status like '%'||#{usVo.status}||'%' ) r, (select LISTAGG(place, ',') within group (order by wayno asc) as fullPlace, mateNo from place group by mateNo) p where s.no = r.mateNo and p.mateNo = r.mateNo and s.status = 'close' and regDate >= #{usVo.sdate} and regDate <= #{usVo.edate} and type like '%'||#{usVo.type}||'%' order by s.no desc)

select rn, type, regDate, fullplace, point, status, mateNo from (select rownum rn, type, regdate, fullplace, point, status, mateNo from (select type, regdate, p.fullplace, r.point, r.status, r.mateNo from spotmate s, (select regdate, point, mateNo from reservation where userNo = #{userNo} and driverNo = #{userNo} and status like '%'||#{usVo.status}||'%' and regDate >= #{usVo.sdate} and regDate <= #{usVo.edate}) r, (select LISTAGG(place, ',') within group (order by wayno asc) as fullPlace, mateNo from place group by mateNo) p where s.no = r.mateNo and p.mateNo = r.mateNo and s.status = 'close' and type like '%'||#{usVo.type}||'%' group by type, regdate, r.point, r.status, p.fullplace, s.no, r.mateNo order by s.no desc)) where rn >= #{sNum} and rn <= #{eNum}

select count(*) count from (select type, regdate, p.fullplace, r.point from spotmate s, (select regdate, point, mateNo from reservation where userNo = #{userNo}) r, (select LISTAGG(place, ',') within group (order by wayno asc) as fullPlace, mateNo from place group by mateNo) p where s.no = r.mateNo and p.mateNo = r.mateNo and s.status = 'open' group by type, regdate, r.point, p.fullplace, s.no order by s.no desc)

choose.when: select count(*) count from (select type, regdate, p.fullplace, r.point from spotmate s, (select regdate, point, mateNo from reservation r where userNo = #{userNo}) r, (select LISTAGG(place, ',') within group (order by wayno asc) as fullPlace, mateNo from place group by mateNo) p where s.no = r.mateNo and p.mateNo = r.mateNo and s.status = 'open' and s.startdate >= to_date(#{usVo.nowTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mm') and regDate >= #{usVo.sdate} and regDate <= #{usVo.edate} and type like '%'||#{usVo.type}||'%' order by s.no desc)

select count(*) count from (select type, regdate, p.fullplace, r.point from spotmate s, (select regdate, point, mateNo from reservation r where userNo = #{userNo}) r, (select LISTAGG(place, ',') within group (order by wayno asc) as fullPlace, mateNo from place group by mateNo) p where s.no = r.mateNo and p.mateNo = r.mateNo and s.status = 'open' and s.startdate < to_date(#{usVo.nowTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mm') and regDate >= #{usVo.sdate} and regDate <= #{usVo.edate} and type like '%'||#{usVo.type}||'%' order by s.no desc)
choose.otherwise: select count(*) count from (select type, regdate, p.fullplace, r.point from spotmate s, (select regdate, point, mateNo from reservation r where userNo = #{userNo}) r, (select LISTAGG(place, ',') within group (order by wayno asc) as fullPlace, mateNo from place group by mateNo) p where s.no = r.mateNo and p.mateNo = r.mateNo and s.status = 'open' and regDate >= #{usVo.sdate} and regDate <= #{usVo.edate} and type like '%'||#{usVo.type}||'%' order by s.no desc)

choose.when: select rn, type, regDate, fullplace, point, mateNo from (select rownum rn, type, regdate, fullplace, point, mateNo from (select type, regdate, p.fullplace, r.point, r.mateNo from spotmate s, (select regdate, point, mateNo from reservation where userNo = #{userNo} and regDate >= #{usVo.sdate} and regDate <= #{usVo.edate}) r, (select LISTAGG(place, ',') within group (order by wayno asc) as fullPlace, mateNo from place group by mateNo) p where s.no = r.mateNo and p.mateNo = r.mateNo and s.status = 'open' and s.startdate >= to_date(#{usVo.nowTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mm') and type like '%'||#{usVo.type}||'%' group by type, regdate, r.point, p.fullplace, s.no, r.mateNo order by s.no desc)) where rn >= #{sNum} and rn <= #{eNum}

select rn, type, regDate, fullplace, point, mateNo from (select rownum rn, type, regdate, fullplace, point, mateNo from (select type, regdate, p.fullplace, r.point, r.mateNo from spotmate s, (select regdate, point, mateNo from reservation where userNo = #{userNo} and regDate >= #{usVo.sdate} and regDate <= #{usVo.edate}) r, (select LISTAGG(place, ',') within group (order by wayno asc) as fullPlace, mateNo from place group by mateNo) p where s.no = r.mateNo and p.mateNo = r.mateNo and s.status = 'open' and s.startdate < to_date(#{usVo.nowTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mm') and type like '%'||#{usVo.type}||'%' group by type, regdate, r.point, p.fullplace, s.no, r.mateNo order by s.no desc)) where rn >= #{sNum} and rn <= #{eNum}
choose.otherwise: select rn, type, regDate, fullplace, point, mateNo, startdate from (select rownum rn, type, regdate, fullplace, point, mateNo, startdate from (select type, regdate, p.fullplace, r.point, r.mateNo, startdate from spotmate s, (select regdate, point, mateNo from reservation where userNo = #{userNo} and regDate >= #{usVo.sdate} and regDate <= #{usVo.edate}) r, (select LISTAGG(place, ',') within group (order by wayno asc) as fullPlace, mateNo from place group by mateNo) p where s.no = r.mateNo and p.mateNo = r.mateNo and s.status = 'open' and type like '%'||#{usVo.type}||'%' group by type, regdate, r.point, startdate, p.fullplace, s.no, r.mateNo order by s.no desc)) where rn >= #{sNum} and rn <= #{eNum}

mapper.select: select rn, type, regDate, fullplace, point, mateNo, startdate from (select rownum rn, type, regdate, fullplace, point, mateNo, startdate from (select type, regdate, p.fullplace, r.point, r.mateNo, startdate from spotmate s, (select regdate, point, mateNo from reservation where userNo = #{userNo}) r, (select LISTAGG(place, ',') within group (order by wayno asc) as fullPlace, mateNo from place group by mateNo) p where s.no = r.mateNo and p.mateNo = r.mateNo and s.status = 'open' group by type, regdate, r.point, startdate, p.fullplace, s.no, r.mateNo order by s.no desc)) where rn >= #{sNum} and rn <= #{eNum}

select rn, type, regDate, fullplace, point, mateNo, startdate from (select rownum rn, type, regdate, fullplace, point, mateNo, startdate from (select type, regdate, p.fullplace, r.point, r.mateNo, startdate from spotmate s, (select regdate, point, mateNo from reservation where userNo = #{userNo} and driverNo = #{userNo}) r, (select LISTAGG(place, ',') within group (order by wayno asc) as fullPlace, mateNo from place group by mateNo) p where s.no = r.mateNo and p.mateNo = r.mateNo and s.status = 'open' group by type, regdate, r.point, startdate, p.fullplace, s.no, r.mateNo order by s.no desc)) where rn >= #{sNum} and rn <= #{eNum}

select count(*) count from (select type, regdate, p.fullplace, r.point, status from spotmate s, (select regdate, point, mateNo from reservation where userNo = #{userNo} and driverNo = #{driverNo}) r, (select LISTAGG(place, ',') within group (order by wayno asc) as fullPlace, mateNo from place group by mateNo) p where s.no = r.mateNo and p.mateNo = r.mateNo and s.status = 'open' group by type, regdate, r.point, status, p.fullplace, s.no, r.mateNo order by s.no desc)

choose.when: select count(*) count from (select type, regdate, p.fullplace, r.point, status from spotmate s, (select regdate, point, mateNo from reservation r where userNo = #{userNo} and driverNo = #{userNo}) r, (select LISTAGG(place, ',') within group (order by wayno asc) as fullPlace, mateNo from place group by mateNo) p where s.no = r.mateNo and p.mateNo = r.mateNo and s.status = 'open' and s.startdate >= to_date(#{usVo.nowTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mm') and regDate >= #{usVo.sdate} and regDate <= #{usVo.edate} and type like '%'||#{usVo.type}||'%' order by s.no desc)

select count(*) count from (select type, regdate, p.fullplace, r.point, status from spotmate s, (select regdate, point, mateNo from reservation r where userNo = #{userNo} and driverNo = #{userNo}) r, (select LISTAGG(place, ',') within group (order by wayno asc) as fullPlace, mateNo from place group by mateNo) p where s.no = r.mateNo and p.mateNo = r.mateNo and s.status = 'open' and s.startdate < to_date(#{usVo.nowTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mm') and regDate >= #{usVo.sdate} and regDate <= #{usVo.edate} and type like '%'||#{usVo.type}||'%' order by s.no desc)
choose.otherwise: select count(*) count from (select type, regdate, p.fullplace, r.point, status from spotmate s, (select regdate, point, mateNo from reservation r where userNo = #{userNo} and driverNo = #{userNo}) r, (select LISTAGG(place, ',') within group (order by wayno asc) as fullPlace, mateNo from place group by mateNo) p where s.no = r.mateNo and p.mateNo = r.mateNo and s.status = 'open' and regDate >= #{usVo.sdate} and regDate <= #{usVo.edate} and type like '%'||#{usVo.type}||'%' order by s.no desc)

choose.when: select rn, type, regDate, fullplace, point, mateNo from (select rownum rn, type, regdate, fullplace, point, mateNo from (select type, regdate, p.fullplace, r.point, r.mateNo from spotmate s, (select regdate, point, mateNo from reservation where userNo = #{userNo} and driverNo = #{userNo} and regDate >= #{usVo.sdate} and regDate <= #{usVo.edate}) r, (select LISTAGG(place, ',') within group (order by wayno asc) as fullPlace, mateNo from place group by mateNo) p where s.no = r.mateNo and p.mateNo = r.mateNo and s.status = 'open' and s.startdate >= to_date(#{usVo.nowTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mm') and type like '%'||#{usVo.type}||'%' group by type, regdate, r.point, p.fullplace, s.no, r.mateNo order by s.no desc)) where rn >= #{sNum} and rn <= #{eNum}

select rn, type, regDate, fullplace, point, mateNo from (select rownum rn, type, regdate, fullplace, point, mateNo from (select type, regdate, p.fullplace, r.point, r.mateNo from spotmate s, (select regdate, point, mateNo from reservation where userNo = #{userNo} and driverNo = #{userNo} and regDate >= #{usVo.sdate} and regDate <= #{usVo.edate}) r, (select LISTAGG(place, ',') within group (order by wayno asc) as fullPlace, mateNo from place group by mateNo) p where s.no = r.mateNo and p.mateNo = r.mateNo and s.status = 'open' and s.startdate < to_date(#{usVo.nowTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mm') and type like '%'||#{usVo.type}||'%' group by type, regdate, r.point, p.fullplace, s.no, r.mateNo order by s.no desc)) where rn >= #{sNum} and rn <= #{eNum}
choose.otherwise: select rn, type, regDate, fullplace, point, mateNo, startdate from (select rownum rn, type, regdate, fullplace, point, mateNo, startdate from (select type, regdate, p.fullplace, r.point, r.mateNo, startdate from spotmate s, (select regdate, point, mateNo from reservation where userNo = #{userNo} and driverNo = #{userNo} and regDate >= #{usVo.sdate} and regDate <= #{usVo.edate}) r, (select LISTAGG(place, ',') within group (order by wayno asc) as fullPlace, mateNo from place group by mateNo) p where s.no = r.mateNo and p.mateNo = r.mateNo and s.status = 'open' and type like '%'||#{usVo.type}||'%' group by type, regdate, r.point, startdate, p.fullplace, s.no, r.mateNo order by s.no desc)) where rn >= #{sNum} and rn <= #{eNum}
